Traditional & Digital Art

Bridging Classical & Modern Techniques

Exploring the art of creation through both traditional and digital mediums. From clay sculpture to 3D printing, each piece bridges classical craftsmanship with modern technology.

Painting

Traditional and digital painting techniques exploring color, form, and expression

Acrylic • Digital • Mixed Media

Drawing

Sketching, illustration, and digital drawing across various subjects and styles

Pencil • Charcoal • Digital Illustration

3D Modelling

Physical and digital 3D creation from clay sculpture to digital modeling

Clay • Balsa Wood • Digital 3D

3D Printing

Modern fabrication techniques bringing digital designs into physical reality

FDM • SLA • Design to Print

The Waveform Generation

Visual Art & Creative Expression • Toronto, Canada
